divorced.I was brought up: gathered from every side; And that is the nephew of the first blow when it comes out of a fire that escapes the people and the food from it until it is gathered, and it was said: I did not say from their saying: If the Sunnah is laughing.And the like of what was brought out by Abd Bin Hamid from Mujahid that he said: Heroes are her death, and on the authority of Ibn Abbas, the interpretation of the crowd with the gathering is that he said that it is the same as the one who has been.I gathered with the death, so do not send and do not attend in the resurrection other than the two giggles.On the authority of Qatada and Group.And in a narration from the ink: the wives are gathered until it is made from some of it for some, and it will be given to the whole of the sons, then it is said that it is dead, then it will die, and it will die.Dust, so it is only left of what is in the secret of the sons of Adam and an admiration for his images, such as Al -Tawaous and Al -Jabi.It was said: Everything that does not exceed it except for the believer is not a case that is not eaten from it except it, and he enters what the paradise remains in a state of it, and it is gone to the same Mill to this news and its part.A Muslim has been brought out to be a Muslim and the trauma from Abu Hurairah in this verse.He said: The Messenger of God, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, said: The resurrection is even leading to the sheep of the Qur’an.Ahmad ibn Hanbal increased: “Even the atom is from the atom.” And the argument of the gazelle and a group of Islam is that it does not give the one who is not the one who is not the same as a family of dignity with a face and not in this chapter, or not in this chapter, It is dependent on it, indicating the precedence of others, and the information of a Muslim and the trauma, even if it is correct, but he did not come out of the exit of the one, and it is the way to the exaggeration of the It will be a fold of complete justice and to this saying, and I will not be obligated to the mistake of those who say the first; Because they have what is reconciled to the sentence.And God Almighty knows.Al -Hasan and Amr ibn Mumoun read: “Hashr” by tightening to multiply.
